snippet.title: The Future of Custom WoW
snippet.description:
Play Free at: https://ascension.gg
Ascension Custom WoW is a free to play World of Warcraft fan project with different realms to challenge Azeroth in brand new ways. Free Pick lets you design your own custom hero by mixing and matching spells, talents, and new Mystic Enchantments from any of the original 9 classes. Wildcard hurls you into Azeroth and TBC with RANDOM spells and talents, demanding that you forge order from chaos and discover the unique synergies and powers in your random build.

Two projects are on the horizon:

Conquest of Azeroth introduces 21 NEW classes to a classic Vanilla+ setting
Bronzebeard is a new realm dedicated to the original 9 classes where you can explore all of Ascension's 8 years of custom content on your favorite vanilla class.

---

Welcome to Project Ascension's first ever Mega Update. This update video covers the next year of Custom WoW content from Ascension. From new realms to things you might not expect, a massive overhaul to the newcomer experience, Wildcard updates, and more, this is one update you're going to want to go into like John Balls.

Wildcard Burning Crusade
BIG Wildcard Updates
BIG Conquest of Azeroth Announcement
New Realm Announcement
Complete Newcomer Overhaul
WHEN WOTLK?

0:00 - 2:06 - Introduction and Overview
2:07 - 3:02 - Season 9:Chapter 3 Trailer
3:03 - 3:54 - Overview: Elune and Wildcard TBC
3:55 - 5:06 - More Scrolls of Fortune for ALL Specs
5:07 - 6:28 - Rapid Rolling
6:27 - 7:20 - 100+ New Spells and Abilities
7:21 - 7:59 - The Complete TBC Adventure
8:00 - 8:25 - Gabril Mewell: Reset Undesired Builds
8:26 - 8:41 - New Darkmoon Skill Card UI
8:42 - 9:40 - New Ability Browser
9:42 - 10:50 - Sunwell Plateau on Area 52
10:51 - 14:52 - Conquest of Azeroth Announcements
14:53 - 20:57 - Introducing a New Original 9 Class Realm
20:58 - 22:50 - Overview: Newcomer Experience Overhaul
22:51 - 24:16 - New: Archetype Selection
24:17 - 25:15 - New: In-Game Tutorials
25:16 - 26:11 - Super Tracker
26:12 - 28:38 - Starting Zone Enhancements
28:39 - 30:04 - Ascension Compendium
30:05 - 30:55 - Mentor System
30:56 - 31:44 - Build Inspect
31:45 - 32:07 - Newcomer Overhaul Conclusion
32:08 - 33:15 - New Dungeon: Karazhan Crypts
33:16 - 34:36 - New Dungeon: Blackrock Caverns
34:37 - 36:01 - TBC Manastorms
36:02 - 36:48 - New Arena Maps
36:49 - 38:19 - General Updates
38:20 - 40:12 - Wrath of the Lich King Announcements
40:13 - 41:25 - Conclusion

Thanks for Watching!!

John Balls Timestamps:

---------------------------------------------------------

Project Ascension: Custom WoW Links

Learn More - https://features.ascension.gg/play-free
Website - https://ascension.gg
Twitter - https://twitter.com/Ascensionfeed
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ascensionproject
Wiki - https://project-ascension.fandom.com/wiki/Project_Ascension_Wiki
